user_query: I want to find the geocoordinates and addresses for hiking trails at the Grand Canyon, Yosemite National Park, and Mount Everest.

TaskList.description: Obtain geocoordinates for the Grand Canyon.
Obtain geocoordinates for Yosemite National Park.
Convert geocoordinates of the Grand Canyon into a human-readable address.
Convert geocoordinates of Yosemite National Park into a human-readable address.
Convert geocoordinates of Mount Everest into a human-readable address.
